cosmos.question: I am big and bright and come out in the day. I give you light and keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I am very, very hot!
🌎 You need me to grow plants.
😎 Don't look directly at me!

cosmos.question: I shine at night, but I have no light of my own. I reflect light from the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🚀 People have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that makes its own light. I am very far away.

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🌌 I am much bigger than the Earth!
🔭 You can see many of me at night.

cosmos.question: I am a place where stars and planets live together. There are billions of stars that make me up.

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral sometimes.
🌌 I am very, very big, even bigger than you can imagine!
🥛 Our sun lives in one!

cosmos.question: I am a cold and icy ball that sometimes has a tail when I get close to the sun.

hints.text: ☄️ I am like a dirty snowball.
🔭 Scientists study me when I come near Earth.
🧊 I am made of ice and dust.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball that goes around the sun. Earth is one of me.

hints.text: 🌍 I can be rocky or gassy.
🪐 I orbit a star.
☄️ There are eight of me in our Solar System.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. People used to use me to navigate!

hints.text: 🐻 The Big Dipper is one of me.
✨ I am made of many stars.
📜 People have given me names for thousands of years

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the sun, mostly found between Mars and Jupiter.

hints.text: 🪨 I am smaller than a planet.
☄️ There are many of me in a belt.
🚀 Sometimes I can crash into planets!

cosmos.question: When I enter Earth's atmosphere, I burn up and become a bright streak of light. I am sometimes called a shooting star.

hints.text: 🔥 I am really small.
✨ I am a tiny piece of space debris.
🌠 People make wishes on me!

cosmos.question: I am a vehicle that people use to travel to space. I can be launched with a big explosion!

hints.text: 🚀 I carry astronauts.
🌍 I can travel to the Moon and beyond.
👩‍🚀 People build me to explore space.

bug.question: I have six legs and can crawl. I like to eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start as a tiny egg.
🍃 I munch on plants.
🎨 I can be many colors.

bug.question: I fly and make honey. I have black and yellow stripes. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I love flowers.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🐝 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I can hop and jump really high. I make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to hang out in grassy areas.
🎶 I make a noise like 'chirp, chirp'.
🟢 I am often green.

bug.question: I am a small red bug with black spots. People say I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my back.
🐞 I am small and round.
🍀 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I build big hills of dirt. I work together with my friends. Who am I?

hints.text: 💪 We are very strong for our size.
🏡 We live underground.
🐜 We are very small.

bug.question: I fly at night and like bright lights. Some people think I look like fairies. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I glow in the dark.
🌙 I am active at night.
💡 I am attracted to lights.

bug.question: I have long legs and spin a web. Some people are scared of me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch food in my home.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏡 I live in the corner of your room.

bug.question: I float on water and have big, beautiful wings. Who am I?

hints.text: 💦 I start my life in the water.
🦋 I have very colorful wings.
🌿 I like to be near ponds and lakes.

bug.question: I am a small, flat bug that sucks blood. I can make you itchy. What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 I need your blood to live.
🛏️ I sometimes live in your bed.
😫 I leave itchy bites.

bug.question: I am a bug that lives on dogs and cats and feeds on their blood. I can jump very high. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐶🐱 I make pets very itchy.
🤸 I am a great jumper.
💉 I drink blood.
